text: Sweet and Sour () is a 1963 French Italian comedy movie directed by Jacques Baratier and starring Guy Bedos, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Babilée, Claude Brasseur, Anna Karina, Sophie Daumier, Jacques Dufilho, Simone Signoret, Françoise Brion, Roger Vadim, Pascale Roberts. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jacques Baratier
title: Sweet and Sour (movie)
